docs.title: out
docs.description: Output file containing the corrected images

docs.title: eddy_parameters
docs.description: Text file containing subject movement and EC-induced field parameters for each volume

docs.title: eddy_rotated_bvecs
docs.description: File containing the reoriented b-vectors for diffusion analysis

docs.title: eddy_rotated_bvecs_for_SLR
docs.description: File with rotated b-vectors for least-squares reconstruction

docs.title: eddy_command_txt
docs.description: Text file documenting the command line used to run eddy

docs.title: eddy_values_of_all_input_parameters
docs.description: List of all parameters used by eddy

docs.title: eddy_movement_rms
docs.description: Summary of total movement for each volume

docs.title: eddy_restricted_movement_rms
docs.description: Estimates movement RMS while disregarding translation in the PE direction

docs.title: eddy_post_eddy_shell_alignment_parameters
docs.description: Text file with rigid body movement parameters between different shells

docs.title: eddy_post_eddy_shell_PE_translation_parameters
docs.description: Translation parameters along the PE direction between different shells

docs.title: eddy_outlier_report
docs.description: Report of detected outlier slices

docs.title: eddy_outlier_map
docs.description: Numeric matrix indicating outlier slices

docs.title: eddy_outlier_n_stdev_map
docs.description: Map of the number of standard deviations for outliers

docs.title: eddy_outlier_n_sqr_stdev_map
docs.description: Map of the number of squared standard deviations for outliers

docs.title: eddy_outlier_free_data
docs.description: Original data with outlier slices replaced, only if --repol was set

docs.title: eddy_movement_over_time
docs.description: Text file with movement parameters over time, only if --mporder > 0

docs.title: eddy_mbs_first_order_fields
docs.description: 4D image file of partial derivative fields, only if --estimate_move_by_susceptibility is set

docs.title: eddy_cnr_maps
docs.description: 4D image file with SNR and CNR maps, only if --cnr_maps is set

docs.title: eddy_residuals
docs.description: 4D image file of residuals, only if --residuals is set

docs.title: eddy
docs.description: A tool for correcting eddy currents and movements in diffusion data
authors: FMRIB Analysis Group, University of Oxford

docs.title: imain
docs.description: File containing all the images to estimate distortions for

docs.title: mask
docs.description: Mask to indicate brain

docs.title: index
docs.description: File containing indices for all volumes in --imain into --acqp and --topup

docs.title: acqp
docs.description: File containing acquisition parameters

docs.title: bvecs
docs.description: File containing the b-vectors for all volumes in --imain

docs.title: bvals
docs.description: File containing the b-values for all volumes in --imain

docs.title: out
docs.description: Basename for output

docs.title: mb
docs.description: Multi-band factor

docs.title: mb_offs
docs.description: Multi-band offset (-1 if bottom slice removed, 1 if top slice removed)

docs.title: slspec
docs.description: Name of text file completely specifying slice/group acuistion. N.B. --slspec and --json are mutually exclusive.

docs.title: json
docs.description: Name of .json text file with information about slice timing. N.B. --json and --slspec are mutually exclusive.

docs.title: mporder
docs.description: Order of slice-to-vol movement model (default 0, i.e. vol-to-vol

docs.title: s2v_lambda
docs.description: Regularisation weight for slice-to-vol movement. (default 1, reasonable range 1--10)

docs.title: topup
docs.description: Base name for output files from topup

docs.title: field
docs.description: Name of file with susceptibility field (in Hz)

docs.title: field_mat
docs.description: Name of rigid body transform for susceptibility field

docs.title: flm
docs.description: First level EC model (movement/linear/quadratic/cubic, default quadratic)

docs.title: slm
docs.description: Second level EC model (none/linear/quadratic, default none)

docs.title: fwhm
docs.description: FWHM for conditioning filter when estimating the parameters (default 0)

docs.title: niter
docs.description: Number of iterations (default 5)

docs.title: s2v_niter
docs.description: Number of iterations for slice-to-vol (default 5)

docs.title: cnr_maps
docs.description: Write shell-wise cnr-maps (default false)

docs.title: residuals
docs.description: Write residuals (between GP and observations), (default false)

docs.title: fep
docs.description: Fill empty planes in x- or y-directions (default false)

docs.title: interp
docs.description: Interpolation model for estimation step (spline/trilinear, default spline)

docs.title: s2v_interp
docs.description: Slice-to-vol interpolation model for estimation step (spline/trilinear, default trilinear)

docs.title: resamp
docs.description: Final resampling method (jac/lsr, default jac)

docs.title: nvoxhp
docs.description: # of voxels used to estimate the hyperparameters (default 1000)

docs.title: initrand
docs.description: Seeds rand for when selecting voxels (default 0=no seeding)

docs.title: ff
docs.description: Fudge factor for hyperparameter error variance (default 10.0)

docs.title: repol
docs.description: Detect and replace outlier slices (default false))

docs.title: ol_nstd
docs.description: Number of std off to qualify as outlier (default 4)

docs.title: ol_nvox
docs.description: Min # of voxels in a slice for inclusion in outlier detection (default 250)

docs.title: ol_type
docs.description: Type of outliers, slicewise (sw), groupwise (gw) or both (both). (default sw)

docs.title: ol_pos
docs.description: Consider both positive and negative outliers if set (default false)

docs.title: ol_sqr
docs.description: Consider outliers among sums-of-squared differences if set (default false)

docs.title: estimate_move_by_susceptibility
docs.description: Estimate how susceptibility field changes with subject movement (default false)

docs.title: mbs_niter
docs.description: Number of iterations for MBS estimation (default 10)

docs.title: mbs_lambda
docs.description: Weighting of regularisation for MBS estimation (default 10)

docs.title: mbs_ksp
docs.description: Knot-spacing for MBS field estimation (default 10mm)

docs.title: dont_sep_offs_move
docs.description: Do NOT attempt to separate field offset from subject movement (default false)

docs.title: dont_peas
docs.description: Do NOT perform a post-eddy alignment of shells (default false)

docs.title: data_is_shelled
docs.description: Assume, don't check, that data is shelled (default false)

docs.title: verbose
docs.description: switch on diagnostic messages

docs.title: eddy
docs.description: A tool for correcting eddy currents and movements in diffusion data
authors: FMRIB Analysis Group, University of Oxford
